alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 2:55AM MST until February 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with locally higher amounts of up to 5 inches possible in the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Eagar-Springerville and Saint Johns. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will become difficult. Patchy blowing snow will cause areas of significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to occur during the late morning and into the early evening. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Eagar-Sprgrvlle 1 to 3 inches Saint Johns 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County
